Admiral.Title: Matt Decker
Admiral.Ability: ACTION: Target a ship within Range 1 of your ship (including your ship). Target ship gains +1 attack die this round and suffers 1 damage to its Hull.
Admiral.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: Target a ship within Range 1 of your ship (including your ship). Target ship gains +1 attack die this round and suffers 1 damage to its Hull.
